discussion.author: chdoc
discussion.comment:
@CohenCyril Do I understand correctly that this is merely renaming a bunch of lemmas that are not contained in any previous release?

@ybertot @thery , could you please have a look (review) and confirm that the new names are well-chosen?

discussion.author: ybertot
discussion.comment: I have no confidence in judging naming policies.  I prefer to pass on this one.

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> @CohenCyril Do I understand correctly that this is merely renaming a bunch of lemmas that are not contained in any previous release?

yes that's correct!
